content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

I'm unable to analyze the image. Could you describe the orientation of the groove, or let me know if it matches any of these predefined scenarios:

- Groove along X-axis
- Groove along Y-axis
- Groove diagonal in the YZ-plane
- Entrance at the left-bottom of the structure
- Corner

This will help determine the stiffness matrix.
